title: Benfica midfielder denies racially abusing Vinicius after Real Madrid match halted
summary_full: Benfica claim there is a "defamation campaign" against Gianluca Prestianni as Uefa launch an investigation into claims he racially abused Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr.
summary_public: Benfica claim there is a "defamation campaign" against Gianluca Prestianni as Uefa launch an investigation into claims he racially abused Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr.

ES.label: negative
ES.evidence: racially abusing Vinicius after Real Madrid match halted
